name: Garden (KSBP)
description:
Giant carnivorous plants have escaped from Elder World.
You've got a pellet gun. Let's rock.

Controls:

Arrow Keys or WASD - Move
Space or Shift - Jump
Move Mouse - Aim
Left Click - Shoot Pellet

Game Modes:

Casual - 5 hit point max, 5 hit point start
Arcade - 3 hit point max, 3 hit point start
Survival - 3 hit point max, 1 hit point start
Hardcore - 1 hit point max, 1 hit point start

Engine and playable beta made in two days (part-time)
Three levels total
Made for #LOWREZJAM2021

FLASH WARNING: Multiple entities and very large entities flash on screen frequently in this game!

If your anti-malware software shows a warning the first time you run the game, let it scan and then it should run without any problem.
